name: Unstable Playground
description:
You are Moon, a ball lost in an abandoned playground, you too want to escape this sculptural labyrinth. After years of wandering, long after the laughs and cries of children are extinguished, you discover a breach in the concrete floor. You squeezed and twisted trying to pass through, without luck. On a moonless night, mysterious floating lights appear in between the walls. Did they fall from the stars? Moon got closer to one, but as soon as it touched it, it disappeared. Could that be Moon’s chance to escape, finding the lights that will let him travel through the breach?

Moon will need the playground, over the years, it is him that has been balancing it around. 

Be quick, when the moon appears again in the sky, it will be too late.
